thread.title: Dr. James Andrews performs knee surgery on Baltimore Ravens' Breshad Perriman: 5 things to know
thread.title_full: Dr. James Andrews performs knee surgery on Baltimore Ravens' Breshad Perriman: 5 things to know

author: avaidya@beckershealthcare.com (Anuja Vaidya)
title: Dr. James Andrews performs knee surgery on Baltimore Ravens' Breshad Perriman: 5 things to know
text:
Dr. James Andrews performs knee surgery on Baltimore Ravens' Breshad Perriman: 5 things to know Written by Anuja Vaidya | Friday, 02 October   
James Andrews, MD, performed knee surgery on Baltimore Ravens rookie Breshad Perriman, according to an ESPN report. 
Here are five things to know: 

1. Dr. Andrews performed arthroscopic surgery on Mr. Perriman's right knee. 

2. Mr. Perriman underwent the procedure after aggravating his sprained knee during a game against the Bengals. 

3. Mr. Perriman is out indefinitely. 

4. Dr. Andrews is the founding member of Andrews Sports Medicine and Orthopaedic Institute in Gulf Breeze, Fla. 

5. He presently serves as the president and chairman of the Board of the Andrews Research and Education Foundation.
